use.flag: Use ffmpeg for playing in-game cutscenes.
Use SDL mixer for in-game sound.
Build the map editor (needs opengl enabled!).

pkgmetadata.longdescription: CorsixTH aims to reimplement the game engine of Theme Hospital, with the capability of loading assets including graphics and levels from the original game. This means that you will need a purchased copy of Theme Hospital, or a copy of the demo, in order to use CorsixTH.
